question.en: TELL US ABOUT YOUR HEALTHMEDICAL HISTORYThere are some medical conditions that could have long term effects on your voice. In the following questions you will be asked about your CURRENT conditions as well as those you may have had in the PAST. Please read each set of questions carefully.NOTE:[All fields will be pre-populated to NO/NEVER unless the person noted the condition at enrollment. E.g. if the person enrolled with chronic cough, then "Chronic cough" will be pre-populated to YES/CURRENT.]
Velopharyngeal insufficiency (e.g. hyponasality, nasal emission, etc.)
Do you currently have any dental condition(s) (e.g. tooth loss, dentures, retainer, braces, etc.)?
Please specify what dental condition(s) you have.
Do you currently have any other condition(s) of your ear, nose, or mouth?
Please specify what other condition(s) of your ear, nose, or mouth you have.
Acid reflux (e.g. heart burn, GERD, etc.)
Airway stenosis (e.g. glottal, subglottal, tracheal, etc.)
Thyroid disease (e.g. thyroid polyp, Hashimoto's Grave's disease, hypo/hyperthyroidism, etc.)
Vocal cord dysfunction/paradoxical vocal fold motion
Please specify what other throat condition(s) you currently have.
Do you feel as though everyday environmental pollution (e.g. smog, smoke, dust, etc) significantly affects your breathing or voice?
Please specify what other speech condition(s) you have.
Airway surgery/reconstruction BELOW the vocal folds (e.g. tracheal reconstruction, balloon dilation, etc.)
Chronic ear surgery (e.g. mastoid surgery, etc.)
Cordotomy, arytenoidectomy, arytenoid tie back, etc.
Sleep surgery (e.g. implantable device for sleep apnea, etc.)
Other surgical treatment for an ear, nose, mouth, throat, or speech condition
Please specify what other surgical treatment(s) you have received for your ear, nose, mouth, throat, or speech condition(s).
Radiation to the head or neck
Other non-surgical treatment for an ear, nose, mouth, throat, or speech condition
Please specify what other non-surgical treatment(s) you are currently receiving for your ear, nose, mouth, throat, or speech condition(s).
Interstitial lung disease (e.g. sarcoidosis, pulmonary fibrosis)
Have you tested positive for COVID in the last 10 days?
Do you currently have any other lung condition?
Please specify what other lung condition(s) you currently have.
Chest surgery (e.g. bronchoscopy, thoracic surgery, etc.)
Are you currently receiving any other treatment(s) for your lung condition(s)?
Please specify what other treatment(s) you are receiving for your lung condition(s).
Do you currently have any other neurological condition(s)?
Please specify what other neurological condition(s) you currently have.
Other treatment for a neurological condition
Please specify what other treatment(s) you are currently receiving for your neurological condition(s).
Anxiety disorder (e.g. generalized or social anxiety disorder)
Please specify what other psychological condition(s) you have.
Talk therapy with a mental health professional (e.g. social worker, psychiatrist, etc.)
Other treatment for a psychological condition
Please specify what other treatment(s) you are currently receiving for your psychological condition(s).
Laryngeal cancer (e.g. vocal folds, epiglottis, etc.)
Oral cancer (e.g. tongue, mouth, gum, tonsil, etc.)
Please specify what other cancer(s) you have had in the past.
Please specify what other cancer(s) you have currently.
Please specify what experimental treatment (e.g. clinical trial) you received in the past.
Please specify what experimental treatment (e.g. clinical trial) you are currently receiving.
Please specify what other cancer treatment(s) you have received in the past.
Please specify what other cancer treatment(s) you are currently receiving.
Which type of diabetes do you have?
Do you currently have any other heart disease(s)?
Please specify what other heart condition(s) you have.
Do you currently have any infectious disease?
Please specify what other infectious disease(s) you have.
What other hormone replacement(s) do you currently take?
Do you currently have periods (with regular or irregular cycles)?

name.en: Does not apply (i.e. I am a male who has never had a period)

question.en: Where in your cycle are you? We ask because this may affect your voice.

name.en: I have gone through menopause or have had a hysterectomy
I no longer have my period due to hormone therapy

question.en: Which trimester of pregnancy are you in?
Standing for long periods such as 30 minutes?
Taking care of your household responsibilities?
Learning a new task, for example, learning how to get to a new place?
How much of a problem did you have joining in community activities (for example, festivities, religious or other activities) in the same way as anyone else can?
How much have you been emotionally affected by your health problems?
Concentrating on doing something for ten minutes?
Walking a long distance such as a kilometre [or equivalent]?
Dealing with people you do not know?
Overall, in the past 30 days, how many days were these difficulties present?
In the past 30 days, for how many days were you totally unable to carry out your usual activities or work because of any health condition?
In the past 30 days, not counting the days that you were totally unable, for how many days did you cut back or reduce your usual activities or work because of any health condition?
Do you do one of these jobs or hobbies that requires using your voice for many hours a day? Check all that apply
Please specify what other job or hobby you have that requires you to use your voice loudly for many hours a day.
How many hours per day do you do this activity with a loud voice or in a loud environment that requires elevating your voice (for instance, a noisy bar or a noisy classroom)?
How good do you think you are at reading out loud in [English/Spanish], - that is, reading out loud at a normal rate without making mistakes and understanding what you read?

How tired are you?
0=not tired at all, 10=extremely tired
On a typical day, how many small (8oz or 230mL) cups of water do you drink?
Today, how many small (8oz or 230mL) cups of water have you had?
On a typical day, do you drink coffee or use other caffeinated products?
What type(s) of caffeinated products do you typically consume?

name.en: Carbonated beverages (e.g. soda, pop. Coke, etc.)

question.en:
On a typical day, how many servings of these caffeinated products do you typically consume? 
One serving is 8 oz or 240 mL of coffee, tea, or energy drinks, 1 oz or 30 mL of espresso, 12 oz or 360 mL of soda
Today, have you had coffee or any other caffeinated products?
What type(s) of caffeinated products have you had today?

name.en: Carbonated beverages (e.g. soda, pop. Coke, etc.)

question.en: How many servings of these caffeinated products have you had today?
Have you ever used any of the following nicotine (tobacco) products? Please check all that apply.

name.en: I have never used a nicotine product
Electronic nicotine product (e.g. e-cigarettes, vape pens, hookah pens, personal vaporizers, e-cigars, e-pipes, e-hookahs, etc.)

question.en: Have you used any nicotine products at least 100 times in your entire life?
Do you currently use any nicotine products every day, some days, or not at all?
How old were you when you first started regularly using nicotine products?
If you have completely stopped using nicotine, about how old were you when you stopped?

name.en: Age when you stopped using: Enter age

question.en: Age when you stopped using: Enter age
For how many years have you used nicotine?
On average, how many times do you use nicotine per day now?

name.en: Number of uses per day: Enter number

question.en: On average, over the entire time that you used nicotine, how many times each day did you use nicotine?

name.en: Number of uses per day: Enter number

question.en: Number of uses per day: Enter number

Do you drink alcohol?
(Drinks can be beer, wine, shots of liquor, cocktails containing a shot of liquor)

name.en: Not currently, but I have in the past

question.en: How often do you have at least one drink containing alcohol?

How many drinks containing alcohol do you have on a typical day when you are drinking?
One drink is 12 oz. or 330 mL of beer, 5 oz. or 150 mL of wine, 1.5 oz. or 45mL (one shot) of liquor
How often did you have six or more drinks on one occasion in the past year?
How many drinks have you had today?
Are you currently in recovery for alcohol use?
Have you ever been in rehab  or counseling for heavy alcohol use?
Have you ever used medicines ON YOUR OWN without a doctor's prescription, or in greater amounts or longer than prescribed?

name.en: Not this year, but I have in the past
One or more times this year

question.en: Have you ever used marijuana, cocaine or crack, and/or other drugs?

name.en: Not this year, but I have in the past
One or more times this year

question.en: In the PAST THREE MONTHS, how often have you  SMOKED marijuana  (e.g. cannabis, pot, grass, hash, weed, etc.) either recreationally or as prescribed by a doctor?
In the PAST THREE MONTHS, how often have you taken marijuana  as an EDIBLE either recreationally or as prescribed by a doctor?
Sedatives or tranquilizers (like sleeping pills or Valium)
Heroin or other opioids, including synthetic opioids like fentanyl
Are you currently in recovery  for substance use?
Have you ever been in rehab  or counseling for heavy substance use?

There are some symptoms that can affect your voice. Are you currently experiencing any of these symptoms? Check all that apply.

name.en: Frequent or severe headache or migraine

Have you smoked at least 100 cigarettes in your entire life? (There are 20 cigarettes in a pack.)?

In the PAST THREE MONTHS, how often have you used marijuana (cannabis, pot, grass, hash, etc.)?

[DEPRECATED]
Have you ever used an electronic nicotine product, even one or two times?
(Electronic nicotine products include e- cigarettes, vape pens, hookah pens, personal vaporizers and mods, e-cigars, e-pipes, and e-hookahs.)

[DEPRECATED]
Do you now use electronic nicotine products?

[DEPRECATED]
Have you ever smoked regularly (more than a few times a month for at least two months)?
This includes tobacco, cannabis, vapes, e-cigarettes, hookah, or pipes.

[DEPRECATED]
At what age did you start smoking?

[DEPRECATED]
At what age did you stop?

One drink is 12 oz. or 330 mL of beer, 5 oz. or 150 mL of wine, 1.5 oz. or 45mL (one shot) of liquor

How many times in the past YEAR have you used a recreational substance or medication for reasons or in doses other than prescribed?
Recreational substances include methamphetamines (speed, crystal), cannabis (marijuana, pot), inhalants (paint thinner, aerosol, glue), tranquilizers (Valium), barbiturates, cocaine, ecstasy, hallucinogens (LSD, mushrooms), or narcotics (heroin).
More than one

Reinke's edema, polypoid corditis, or smoker's larynx
Vocal fold dysfunction, paradoxical vocal fold motion, or inducible laryngeal obstruction
Vocal fold polyp, nodule, or cyst
